trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>az esemény akkor következik be, ha egy intelligens címkék panelen látható vagy rejtett.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: Ez az esemény nem jön létre közvetlenül a panelen, hanem inkább az a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>osztály a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>és <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>metódusok végrehajtása.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Az a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>esemény, a `relatedObject` paraméter mindig hivatkozik a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>a panel kapcsolódó.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely megadja, hogy folyamatban van-e a panel látható vagy rejtett.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi azt jelzi, hogy az intelligens Címkés panel alatt látható vagy rejtett.

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a panel alatt rejtett keresztül <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>metódus, ez a tulajdonság értéke <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> hívása

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a panel ablak látható <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, ez a tulajdonság értéke <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> hívásakor keresztül

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"></xref> that indicates the state of the panel.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"> </xref> , amely jelzi, hogy a panel állapotát.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Az objektum, amely lekérdezi a intelligenscímke panel társított.

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: A RelatedObject tulajdonság lehetővé teszi, hogy az <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>osztály</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> egy példányát az objektumokkal való társítás programozói

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: Ez az objektum akkor érhető el a módszereket, amelyek kezelik a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>esemény.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> associated with the smart tag panel.
